title: debian-main
alt: dpkg: error processing package (--purge): subprocess pre-removal script returned error exit 163: OH_GOD_THEYRE_INSIDE_MY_CLOTHES
transcript:
AAAAAAAA
[A swarm of insects cover Cueball and his computer. He is leaning back on their chair, flailing to get away.]My package made it into Debian-main because it looked innocuous enough; no one noticed "locusts" in the dependency list.
